__e: I told her I was here as your guest, and she just shoved that ratty old fur into my hands like I was her slave.
I understand, a man walks around in a $50,000 chinchilla coat and never even bought me a cup of coffee... there's something wrong there.
Seriously. I heard he has a coat made out of dog fur.
There was some fur and teeth, and neighbors been stopping by all day, looking for their cat.
She says it is your coat, and that's why she's giving it to you.
You know how many animals were killed to make that coat and how they were killed?
